game.title: Axe of the Ancients: Dwarven Fury
game.description:
Axe of the Ancients: Dwarven Fury is an epic action hack-and-slash adventure, blending stunning visuals with classic gameplay inspired by Warcraft and Golden Axe.  

Step into the boots of Thorne, a battle-hardened dwarf who, at 75, thought his warrior days were over—until fate called him back to arms. Corruption has overtaken his homeland, and only his legendary axe can restore balance. His journey begins in the dreaded Dungeon of Skeletons, a cursed crypt where the undead roam restlessly. With every swing, Thorne carves a path through darkness, uncovering secrets of the Ancients and forging his legacy.  

Are you ready to embrace the fury and reclaim what was lost?
game.instructions: Left mouse button - Attack, Right mouse button - Lock on enemy, WASD keys - Move, Spacebar - Jump, SHIFT - Run, E - Strong attack, Q - Roll, P - Pause

game.title: Revenge and Justice
game.description:
Revenge and Justice is a gripping tale of vengeance, survival, and redemption in a world ravaged by destruction. Step into the role of Salvador, a skilled archer, as he embarks on a perilous journey through ruined cities reclaimed by nature, desolate wastelands, and hostile territories teeming with danger.  

In 2050, a devastating global war unleashed catastrophic weapons, triggering violent earthquakes that shattered civilization. The world was thrown into chaos, reducing humanity to scattered settlements, where survival became the only goal. Years passed, and a fragile peace settled over the remnants of society—until terror struck once again.  

A chilling warning reached Salvador’s village: “Leave, or we will take this land by force.” When the villagers refused, a brutal attack left most of them dead. Against all odds, Salvador survived. Now, fueled by loss and a burning desire for justice, he sets out on a mission to confront those who shattered his world. Will vengeance consume him, or will justice prevail?
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Move, Spacebar - Jump, SHIFT - Run, R - Reload, Q - Roll, P - Pause

game.title: Arena Baby Tournament
game.description:
Arena Baby Tournament is a fast-paced old-school shooter game inspired by classic games like "Unreal Tournament" and " Quake 3 Arena".

Step back into the golden age of gaming with "Arena Baby Tournament," an old-school arena third-person shooter that captures the essence of classic gameplay with a modern twist. In a dark and atmospheric world, players will engage in fast-paced combat across arenas. With an emphasis on skill-based Movement and chaotic Gunplay, "Arena Baby Tournament" invites you to unleash your inner champion and dominate the battlefield.

game.description: Legendary Archer is a thrilling archery adventure that puts your precision and focus to the ultimate test. Set against the hauntingly beautiful backdrop of ancient castle ruins, it’s just you, your bow, and a ticking clock. With 50 levels spread across 5 stunning and increasingly challenging locations, this game keeps you on your toes as the stakes get higher with each round. Designed to push your skills to the limit, Legendary Archer combines immersive gameplay with breathtaking scenery, delivering an unforgettable experience for players of all levels. Master your aim, conquer the challenges, and become the ultimate archer!

game.title: Two Hands of Satan
game.description:
Two Hands of Satan is a thrilling multiplayer first-person shooter that plunges players into intense, chaotic battles. This free-to-play game is designed to captivate with fast-paced, competitive gameplay, setting it apart in the shooter genre. Immerse yourself in electrifying 3v3 deathmatches, battling in vibrant arenas filled with intense action and atmospheric design. The game’s easy-to-learn controls and accessible interface make it perfect for both seasoned players and newcomers looking for adrenaline-pumping fun.

Whether you’re teaming up with friends or joining players worldwide, Two Hands of Satan brings unmatched excitement with its fast rounds and strategic playstyle. With simple, intuitive mechanics, this game is optimized for anyone craving an accessible, high-energy shooter experience without the cost.

game.title: The Surreptitious Operation
game.description:
The Surreptitious Operation is an intense action-adventure game that puts players in the shoes of Jack, a young and dedicated homeland security agent. Known for his patriotism and sharp instincts, Jack has quickly risen through the ranks, despite only having five years of experience. His trusted friend George, an investigative journalist, uncovers a trail of disturbing evidence linked to a powerful corporation. Alarmed, George turns to Jack for help.

When Jack reports the findings to his superiors, he’s met with an unexpected order to drop the case. Torn between loyalty and his duty to protect his country, Jack chooses to defy the orders and secretly embarks on a dangerous solo mission to uncover the corporation’s secrets. Players must guide Jack as he infiltrates the corporation’s offices, risking everything to safeguard his country from potential threats.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Movement, R - Reload, SHIFT - Run, C - Crouch, Q - Roll, 2 - Night vision, P - Pause

game.title: Volunteer to the Darkness
game.description: Volunteer to the Darkness is a gripping tale of survival and sacrifice, following Jose, a young man from South America, as he embarks on a perilous journey to the United States in search of a better life with his love, Lucia. Upon arriving in Los Angeles, Jose is met with harsh realities and endless obstacles, but the promise of U.S. citizenship drives him forward. His opportunity comes through an offer to join the military, but the path is deadly. Forced into a brutal competition known as "The Crucible," Jose's determination is further tested when he learns that Lucia has been kidnapped. With her life on the line, Jose must navigate the harrowing challenges ahead. Victory means freedom, failure means death.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, Scroll wheel - Change weapon, WASD keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, R - Reload, F - Pick up, SHIFT - Run, P - Pause

game.title: Seeking Justice In The Galaxy
game.description:
Seeking Justice In The Galaxy is an epic game tale set in the aftermath of a cataclysmic world war in 2070, which left Earth ravaged and uninhabitable. Survivors ventured into space, forming a peaceful union on habitable planets. However, after nearly a century of tranquility, a coalition of three planets called the "Atlantic League," shattered the peace. They trained formidable military forces and unleashed chaos, enslaving planets and looting resources.

One planet, Resistentia, refused to surrender and fought back fiercely, managing to repel the invaders. Determined to prevent future attacks, Resistentia's leaders planned a daring commando operation. They dispatched their best soldier, Darius, on a covert mission to neutralize strategic targets across the three hostile planets. Darius, aboard a stealth ship, embarks on a high-stakes journey to restore peace and justice in the galaxy.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, Scroll wheel - Change weapon, WASD keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, R - Reload, F - Pick up, SHIFT - Run, P - Pause

game.title: Robot wars : Rise of Resistance
game.description:
In the year 2100, Fifteen years after the devastating Third World War, the once great cities of Earth lay in ruins. Most of the population had been annihilated, and a few thousand numbers of survivors struggled to live. A group of wealthy elites, who had sheltered in their expensive bunkers during the war, emerged and established a colonial government, exploiting the remnants of humanity. They recruited a legion of ruthless mercenary soldiers, enforcing their rule with brutal repression.

A small group of people, want to fight back against the colonialists and restore freedom to the world. They formed a resistance movement and began to gather support from the oppressed people. Among the rebels, a group of engineers and scientists had embarked on a daring project: the creation of a combat robot capable of turning the tide of the conflict. Day and night, they worked tirelessly, pooling their knowledge and resources. The Resistance Coalition embarked on a series of missions to weaken the colonial government's grip on power. Their first objective was to liberate the city of New Hope, a once vibrant metropolis now under the occupation of the enemy's forces.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, SHIFT - Run, R - Reload, E - Pick up, Q - Roll, P - Pause

game.title: Tiger Family Simulator
game.description:
Tiger Family Simulator is a captivating game where you complete quests and level up to start and nurture your tiger family. Hunt and explore together in a vast, snowy forest, enhancing your family's traits to stay the strongest. With intuitive joystick controls, guiding your tiger is simple and realistic.

Choose unique breeds for each family member, each with distinct characteristics, adding depth to your gameplay. Engage in a wide variety of quests and upgrade your tiger's energy, health, and attack power to survive against predators.

Encounter diverse creatures and formidable bosses on your journey through a meticulously detailed open world. Enjoy daily gifts for consistent play and immerse yourself in a stunning environment. Experience the thrill of the wild in the Tiger Family Simulator!

game.title: Wolf Family Simulator
game.description:
Wolf Family Simulator is an action game where you live the life of a wolf in a captivating autumn forest. Embark on thrilling hunts, explore diverse locations, and build a formidable wolf pack.

Create a Wolf Family

Start by finding a mate at level 10 to assist in battles and protect against forest dangers. Reach level 20 to introduce a cub and tackle challenges together.

Enhance Survival Skills

Develop vital survival skills to protect your family. Boost health, energy, and damage stats for you and your wolf pack.

Unlock Diverse Wolf Breeds

Begin as a basic wolf and unlock breeds like the gray wolf, Indian wolf, jackal, coyote, and white wolf as you progress.

Face Forest Bosses

Watch out for powerful leaders like bears, tigers, and other wolves as you explore.

Open World Adventure

Explore a beautiful forest, gather coins, and improve survival traits.

Complete Quests and Earn Rewards

Finish exciting quests to gain experience and coins. Log in daily for special gifts!

Your primary objective is to survive while collecting 10 "Grimace Shake" shakes scattered across the eerie, expansive island. Follow the initial trail of light to your first shake and delve into the island's dark, deserted corners. The small map will be your guide as you navigate the treacherous terrain, ensuring you avoid succumbing to the island's horrors before completing your mission. Explore, survive, and conquer your fears in this gripping new adventure.

game.title: The Lonesome Shooter
game.description:
In the desolate plains of Wyoming, there lived an aged cowboy named Jack. His weathered face bore the marks of a life spent in hard work, and his heart held unwavering love for his only son, Ethan, who had left the ranch to serve in the US Army.
One day, a somber knock on his door shattered his tranquility. A military officer delivered the heart-wrenching news: Ethan had been killed in action. The old cowboy's world crumbled around him, his grief threatening to consume him. Days turned into nights as Jack mourned the loss of his beloved son. But a sense of unease lingered in his mind. Rumors had reached his ears that Ethan's death may not have been as straightforward as the official report claimed.
Jack embarked on a solitary investigation. With the help of a former buddy, he delved into the murky depths of the conflict, seeking answers that had been deliberately concealed. Their search led them to a remote outpost where Ethan had been stationed. As they pieced together fragments of information from reluctant soldiers, a chilling truth emerged. Ethan had not died in battle but had fallen victim to a satanic ritual, a sacrifice at the hands of his own comrades.
Jack vowed to expose the truth and bring justice to his son's memory. He then goes to his son's mission field with the motive of revenge.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Movement, 1 || 5 - Change weapon, SHIFT - Run, Spacebar - Jump, P - Pause, R - Reload, E - Pick up weapon

game.title: The Scythian Warrior
game.description:
In the golden age, life was always spring. The soil was fertile and there was plenty of food. People were good and happy and old age came late. They were constantly in pleasant and free air and knew neither war nor poverty. Then came the Silver Age. Hunger and cold prevailed. People became selfish and divided. After the Silver Age, the Bronze Age came. People learned to make weapons and started to fight with each other.

The last age, the Iron Age, was the age of crime and infamy, and it was a time when mankind was completely destroyed due to greed and hatred. In the vast steppes of Scythia, a solitary warrior named Aryasp embarked on a perilous quest. Sent by his tribe's chief, he ventured into the depths of an ancient dungeon, To defeat the king who had killed many warriors.

Ghostly apparitions, malevolent spirits, hidden traps, and macabre puzzles await discovery. Armed with only a gun, players must unravel the mansion’s dark past while contending with dread. Can you survive the horrors within? 🕯️🔍

Be prepared for intense battles and scares as you uncover the dark secrets hidden within the spaceship.

With a combination of action, horror, and first-person shooter elements, this game is perfect for horror enthusiasts.

Witness real-time muscle growth and earn status points for each level completed. Unleash your inner muscle-building champ!

game.title: Would You Rather?
game.description:
"Would You Rather?" stands as the quintessential group game for friends, offering an exciting array of over 120 thought-provoking questions. It's the ideal addition to any gathering, providing a perfect platform for social amusement. This party app promises an engaging experience, catering to both small groups and family settings, fostering shared moments of laughter and discussion. Its offline functionality adds to its versatility, transforming tedious road trips into engaging sessions filled with friendly debates and amusement.

Delve into a myriad of challenging "Would You Rather?" scenarios, spanning from the squeaky-clean to the daringly risqué, poised to challenge and entertain your circle of friends and loved ones. Will you conquer them all? This game sets the stage for an enjoyable and interactive experience, offering endless possibilities for lively conversations and unforgettable moments.

TOGETHER offers an immersive gameplay experience, blending intriguing mechanics with visually stunning environments.

game.title: The Resistance Fighters
game.description:
The story of the game is about a young man who defends his country against enemies' invasion.

Isa is a young man who was born in America. His parents are Palestinian Christians who immigrated to America. One day Isa sees on TV that the Israelis have attacked Palestine again. But something catches his attention. The pictures are of their ancestral village. Isa's grandfather and some of their relatives still live there. Isa, who is impatient, decides to go to Palestine. He buys a plane ticket at the first opportunity and goes to Jordan and enters Palestine through there.

game.description:
In the twenty-second century, advanced technology has made life possible on planets across the galaxy. There are many constructions on different planets and many people live on other planets. All humans live under the nationwide empire of a king named Dara.
The protection of the people is done by a special army called immortals, who have been genetically modified into superhumans and have much higher power than ordinary people. Their wounds will heal on their own. The emperor has a queen named Esther, who has created many organizations on different planets using her political position.

One day, a special force of immortals is called to Queen Esther. He has done the most difficult missions so far. The queen orders him to go to one of her facilities on a planet where experiments are going out of control. He must rescue and bring the project manager from there.

While the initial levels may seem relatively simple, brace yourself for an escalating difficulty curve as you progress through the game. By the time you conquer the first ten levels, you'll find yourself facing increasingly demanding obstacles, making for an even more exhilarating adventure. Get ready to leap, run, and conquer in Parkour World!

game.description:
Skibidi Online is a fast-paced 3D multiplayer shooter game where you can defend against attacking Skibidi Toilets in PvP or CO-OP mode. Choose from a variety of melee and ranged weapons to take down your opponents, and use your skills and teamwork to survive.

The game features 10 different maps, each with its own unique challenges. You'll need to use all of your cunning and agility to stay alive in the face of overwhelming odds. The game is easy to learn but difficult to master. Whether you're a seasoned FPS player or a complete beginner, Skibidi Online is sure to provide hours of fun.

If you're looking for a challenging and exciting multiplayer shooter game, then Skibidi Online is the game for you. Download it today and start the battle!

game.title: Kurofune Samurai
game.description:
Kurofune Samurai is a free third-person action samurai game set in 19th-century Japan. The story is about a samurai who is called to help by the people of an oppressed village. His goal is to take the rights of the people from the oppressive ruler and fight with the ruler's guards and ninjas .

The people of Shizukana had a good life. The lord who ruled over them acted justly. One day a delegation from the American government asked for a trade agreement with the lord of the region, but he refused. The Americans equipped the lord's brother Akumo and incited his brother against him. With the help of American military weapons, he won and ruled Shizukana. Akumo was a stubborn and violent man, and his oppression of the people of Shizukana gradually increased. He had enslaved the people and anyone who could not provide the required product was severely and cruelly punished. Exhausted, the people decide to ask an old samurai for help. After hearing about the oppression, the samurai agreed to help and set out to investigate and rescue the villagers.

You must react quickly, jump accurately and climb up dexterously to avoid crashing into obstacles and falling down. As you progress through the various levels, you will encounter increasing difficulty and new challenges such as moving platforms and rotating obstacles.

game.title: A Visit to Hell
game.description:
A Visit to Hell is a first-person platformer game with beautiful low-poly graphics. The game features a challenging level design that will test your platforming skills to the limit. You play as a wounded NATO soldier who is in a state between life and death. Your soul enters the afterlife, where you must navigate a series of dangerous obstacles to reach the exit. Along the way, you will see the fate of others who have died, and you will learn about the true meaning of hell.

The game's low-poly graphics are stunning, and they perfectly capture the eerie atmosphere of the afterlife. The level design is also well-crafted, and it offers a good balance of challenge and excitement. The gameplay is simple to learn but difficult to master, and it will keep you entertained for hours on end.

In this game, you can improve your driving skills by learning how to park your car in a variety of challenging situations. You will also learn about different traffic signs, which will help you in real life.

The game features many levels, each with its own unique challenges. You will need to avoid hitting obstacles, pass driving school tests, and park your car in tight spaces. As you progress through the levels, the challenges will become more difficult.

In addition to the challenging gameplay, Park It also features stunning graphics and realistic physics. You will feel like you are actually driving a car as you maneuver through the levels.

It is now up to this seasoned warrior to face the odds and emerge victorious. Join forces with the aging hero as he embarks on an exhilarating battle against formidable adversaries. Together, let us assist this remarkable elderly gentleman in achieving triumph.
