game.title: Swordsman of Persia
game.description: Swordsman of Persia: Ancient Story transports players back to ancient Persia through a captivating and immersive third-person action platformer experience. As the protagonist, Bahram, players will embark on a journey filled with adventure and excitement as they strive to avenge the massacre of their town, Khavarshahr, and rescue the captive citizens, including the beloved king's daughter. The invasion of Bahram's hometown by ruthless invaders has resulted in widespread destruction and loss of life. Driven by the need to seek revenge and free his people, Bahram sets out on a quest that will test his skills and determination. With beautiful graphics and a thrilling storyline, Swords of Persia: Ancient Story is a must-play for anyone who loves action games set in historical environments.
game.instructions: Mouse - Attack, WASD keys - Movement, SHIFT - Run, Spacebar - Jump, E - Interaction, P || ESC - Menu

game.title: My Land: King Defender
game.description: As a king, you have been bestowed with the responsibility of protecting your kingdom from monster attacks. In order to do so, you must strive to expand your kingdom by purchasing new lands, gathering resources, and selling them to earn gold. With this gold, you can upgrade your tools, build towers for defense, and find hidden chests to gain valuable resources. By utilizing these resources and tools, you can create a great and beautiful kingdom, solidifying your role as a true king who is dedicated to the preservation of his land. Remember, your ultimate goal is to save your kingdom, and it is up to you to make it happen. Take charge and build a kingdom that will be remembered for generations to come.
game.instructions: Mouse - Movement

game.title: Black Apocalypse
game.description:
The year 2050 marked the beginning of a global conflict that utilized weapons of mass destruction, leading to widespread destruction and loss of life on a massive scale. Many people died from the direct effects of the war, while others succumbed to disease and starvation.
Despite this catastrophic event, humanity eventually managed to rebuild and the population started to grow once again. New communities were established in areas of the world that had not been affected by the war.
In this game, you will play as a hero from a village that has recently been attacked by wolves. Your objective is to protect your fellow villagers and navigate this perilous world in order to survive. Good luck on your journey.
game.instructions: Mouse - Attack, WASD keys - Movement, SHIFT - Run, Spacebar - Jump, E - Interaction, P || ESC - Menu

game.title: Gibbets: Bow Master
game.description:
Gibbets: Bow Master is a fun and challenging online game where players must use their archery skills to save people from being hanged. The game features various levels, each with a different set of challenges and obstacles that players must overcome.
In each level, players must use their bow and arrow to cut the rope holding up a person who has been hanged. However, players must be careful not to accidentally hit the person they are trying to save, as this will result in a game over. To make things even more challenging, players must also navigate various obstacles such as wind, moving platforms, and blocks, all while trying to make the perfect shot.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Black Soldier of Rome
game.description: Black soldier of Rome is a fighter game where you will be playing as an African warrior serving within the Roman army. He’s an older soldier who has been promoted to the post of commander. His mission is to attack enemy tribes that find themselves to the north of Rome. However, on his way there, his whole unit has been slain and he stands alone. The mission has to be completed though, so be sure to help him out. Start your dangerous quests full of enemies. You will need to fight for your life throughout the whole game. Be sure to try this one out!
game.instructions: Left mouse button - Attack, Scroll wheel - Lock on target, Right mouse button - Block, WASD keys - Movement, SHIFT - Run, Q - Roll, P - Pause

game.title: Mini Samurai Kurofune
game.description: Mini Samurai Kurofune is a story of a samurai who is called up by people from an exploited village. One day, a delegation from America has arrived that wanted to strike a business deal with them. The ruler has rejected this partnership. The Americans then joined forces with the rulers brother Akumo and started a war. Akumo is now the new ruler, but his cruelty is terrifying the village and the locals sent for help to a samurai - you. You’ve accepted and now start your quest to free the innocent folk.
game.instructions: Left mouse button - Attack, Scroll wheel - Secondary attack, Right mouse button - Lock on target, WASD keys - Movement, E - Block, Q - Roll, P - Pause

game.title: Gears of Babies
game.description: Gears of Babies is a well made third-person shooter game where you play as Nick, a courageous baby who is trying to protect the right of babies in America! The babies are tired of waiting for a clean diaper or basic foodstuffs like milk, while the government is funding foreign wars. Your hero is therefore trying to do whatever he can to get the necessary diapers. Traverse enemy territory and kill all of your enemies that stand in your way. Pick up a gun and start shooting!
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Mouse - Shooting, R - Reload, C - Crouch, SHIFT - Run, Spacebar - Cover

game.title: Dinogen Online
game.description: Dinogen Online is an online 2D multiplayer action shooter with a lot of weapons, game modes and maps. Unlock new weapons, dinosaurs, gear, items and much more by getting XP in the game! You can play either as human or as dinosaur in game modes such as Team Deathmatch, Capture the Flag or Destruction. You can play one of the many survival modes and try to withstand never-ending waves of enemies, such as militiamen, dinosaurs, helicopters and many others. Create your own maps and missions with the in-game editor. The editor is a great tool that will allow you to change already available maps and missions or create wholly new ones. All of the scenarios you make will be available right away in the game and you will be able to play them yourself or with friends online.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Movement, SHIFT - Sprint, CTRL - Crouch, E - Interaction, R - Reload, Spacebar - Melee, G - Grenade, F - Use equipment, Q - Switch weapon, TAB - Scoreboard, Enter key - Chat

game.title: Arena Heroes Tactics!
game.description: Hire, teach and equip warriors, customize and manage your own unique squad to explore Catacombs and fantasy Dungeons! Build the strongest team, create more combinations and make your personal strategy and fight against other players online on PvP Arena battles like traditional MOBA. Play Tournaments, take rewards and win epic chests in Championships! Challenge top players in online leaderboards! Or simple collect rewards from Dungeons, complete special Events and raid the Bosses - just chill out.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Mini Colony
game.description: Mini Colony is yet another online game from the series, this time you’ll be building up your own small colony. You find yourself on arid islands, so survival won’t be that easy. Right at the beginning you will get 3 workers helping you out (they can chop wood for instance). Thanks to them, you will be able to enlarge your colony and buy new tools. The wood itself won’t be enough and you’ll have to find other resources that will allow you to thrive. Food is also very important, so be sure to quickly set up a farm and care for your animals. There’s a ton of options, so don’t worry about getting bored.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction, Scroll wheel - Zoom, WASD keys - Movement, Q || E - Rotate camera

game.title: Security Breach
game.description: Security Breach is a horror FNAF game where you will be trying to survive. Right at the beginning, you will be able to pick from 2 stories and multiple settings. After that, the true danger starts. You are locked in a room and need to find out how to get out. Once you manage to do that, another problem comes up - there are enemies outside who are trying to get rid of you. Be sure to move cautiously and hide whenever possible.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction, WASD keys - Movement

game.title: The Patriots : Fight and Freedom
game.description: The Patriots: Fight and Freedom is about a young woman named Ashley who is living with her husband and child in a small town in the US. One day, she hears explosions and emergency sirens. There are military vehicles in the city and the news are that a coup against the American government has been organized with the perpetrators capturing the president. Ashley grabs her weapon and joins the resistance to save her country. Help her out and see her succeed!
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Mouse - Shooting, C - Crouch, SHIFT - Run, Spacebar - Jump, E - Interaction, R - Reload, P - Pause

game.title: The Letter: Seeker Of Truths
game.description: The Letter: Seeker Of Truths is a story game where you will find out at the beginning that an American journalist has been attacked. Her office has been targeted in a terrorist attack. Her objective will be to find out who wanted to kill her and who is part of this dangerous organization. Be sure to use the help of your friends who will accompany you through the game. Aside from that, there will be 3D graphics to enjoy and fun gameplay. Good luck with uncovering the truth.
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Mouse - Camera, C - Crouch, SHIFT - Run, Spacebar - Jump, E - Interaction, P - Pause

game.title: Super Red
game.description: Super Red is a fairly difficult shooter game where you will have to use your time cautiously. You can slow down time by standing still and make it flow normally again by moving. Use this skill against your enemies. To move your character, you can use the WASD keys. While moving time will flow normally, when standing still the time will slow down. The goal of the game is to kill as many enemies as possible. They will spawn in the arena continuously. You need to always be on your toes and think about your next move.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Movement

game.title: Squad Hero Tower
game.description: Squad Hero Tower is a mixed action and puzzle game where you will have to put your hero into a tower and fight against enemies who are dressed similarly to Squad Game. The objective of your hero will be to kill all enemies around. To do so, he has to have a higher number than the enemy. For each kill, the number of your hero will increase and you can move to other parts of the tower. Like this, you can destroy all of your opponents and win the level. The game offers a total of 40 levels, so don’t worry about getting bored soon. For the money you earn, you will be able to purchase new skins.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: City Blocks
game.description: City Blocks is a logical puzzle game where you will be connecting 3 buildings of the same type in order to build a new, larger building. You can continue to do so for as long as you have space to build these buildings, because once you start running low on real estate, the game will get much more difficult. You receive a Joker during the game that can help you out in this situation. It can be used to buy a building of a specific type that you need to combine with 2 others in order to free some space. The larger your city will become, the higher your score will get, so be sure to aim high.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Let's Fart Brandon
game.description:
Let's Fart Brandon: Browser is a free funny action/comedy game featuring Mr Biden and his infamous farts.

The Story: Mr. Biden falls asleep at a conference and has nightmares. In the world of his nightmare, his only weapon is fart.

Game Features:
Funny top down actin horror/comedy gameplay
Easy to pick up and play
For fans of fun and comedy games
Suitable for both female and male players
Good graphic with stable performance on older PCs
Unique surreal nightmare world with sense of humor
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Spacebar - Fart

game.title: House Builder
game.description: House Builder is a very simple online game where you won’t be tasked with any super complicated tasks. Right at the start of the game, you will be presented with an empty space where you’ll be able to build the building of your dreams. Start with the walls that have to have the correct shape and form. After that, you can start putting in accessories and furniture. Add tables, chairs, sofas, flowers, etc. You can also buy other buildings and decorate them to your liking. It’s all up to you! So come on, let’s play!
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Mini Farm
game.description: Mini Farm is a great online game where you will be helping your little farmer take care of the whole farm. Aside from growing crops and fishing, you will have to take care of many animals, such as pigs, cows or even sheep. For the money you earn, you will be able to purchase more animals or crops and make your farm larger. Aside from that you can also improve your accommodations and buy new furniture. You earn money by selling crops and produce in the city. The game provides you with a ton of options, so be sure to explore quite a bit! We are pretty sure you won’t be bored.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction, Right mouse button - More options in inventory, WASD keys - Movement, Q || E - Rotate camera, SHIFT - Attack

game.title: Count Masters
game.description: Count Masters is an interesting online game that is also available on mobile devices. It offers unique gameplay where your main objective will be to defeat your opponents and avoid obstacles in the process. It’s interesting in a sense that your army can only get larger by walking through a gate. The number written on the gate signifies the number by which your army will grow larger. Pick the right gate so that you get as many warriors as possible. You will need the warriors to defeat all of your enemies. So be sure to try the game out!
game.instructions: Mouse - Movement

game.title: Octagon
game.description: The task in today's game will be to avoid various holes and get as far as possible. The whole game offers 1 game mode. It's an endless mode, so you'll be playing all the time. Get the ball to the goal. The level is generated automatically and is constantly changing, so you need to adjust to it. Also, the speed increases and the game will become more and more challenging. How far can you go? Write your score in the comments.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement

game.title: Snowboard Tricks
game.description: Snowboard Tricks is a rather simple game that offers you just 2 levels. The graphics are rather simple as well, but you’re able to do whatever you want with your character. You start the game on a hill and your objective is to avoid all of the obstacles coming your way and not to fall down. As you do this, you should also try to show off your tricks, such as flip, etc. It’s up to you to come up with the stunts. The controls aren’t the easiest around, but you'll surely figure them out.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, V - Grab snowboard

game.title: Tavern Master
game.description: Build a tavern from the ground up in any way you imagine it! It can be a classy place meant to serve kings or a restaurant which specializes in great food. Optimize your seating arrangement to allow your staff to be as fast as possible, upgrade and expand to attract even more patrons and spread your business to include a hotel, a weapon shop and maybe even a medieval food delivery service! In order to keep your customers happy you will need to have enough food and drinks at all times, efficient staff, great decorations and proper lights. Combine all of that with your imagination and your tavern might be the best in the kingdom!
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Shy Eye Labyrinth: Prototype
game.description: You have been locked in the labyrinth with a quest. Find four keys to open a way out. Each key is hidden in a unique level. Can you discover labyrinth’s secrets, overcome it’s puzzles and find the keys? This is just a prototype, not a fully developed game. You can send us feedback in comments. Discord
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, SHIFT - Run, F - Interaction, C - Teleport to centerport, ESC - Menu

game.title: The Untitled Happiness Project
game.description:
As a worker for the Happiness corporation you are sent to the Phaseolus town to make two of its inhabitants - Jonathan Perry and Rachel Portland - happy again.
Follow them during their day routine, explore the town and talk with residents to gain information which will help you solve their case and make them happy again.

You can send us feedback in comments.
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, F - Interaction, TAB - Mindmap, P - Reset, ESC - Menu

game.title: Wounded Winter: A Lakota Story
game.description:
About
Wounded Winter: A Lakota Story is a free action / shooter western game with a beautiful low poly graphic.
Story
The hero of the story is called Akecheta, who is a Lakota(Native American). The Akecheta tribe is attacked and its people are killed while he is hunting. The attackers also took Akecheta's wife with them. Akecheta embarks on a perilous journey to bring his wife back and avenge the murderers of his tribe.
game.instructions: Left mouse button - Shooting, Right mouse button - Aim, WASD keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, R - Reload, C - Crouch, Q - Roll

game.title: Deadswitch 3
game.description:
Deadswitch 3 is a fast-paced action game where you find yourself in an arena full of enemies and your goal is to eliminate them all. You will have many modes, maps and weapons at your disposal. Since this is a multiplayer game, be sure to call a friend and play the game together!

Ranked
- you play with real players or against bots
- you can upgrade your character or its special skills
- as you play through the game, you will be getting new equipment and your rank will be getting higher and higher

Operations
- complete missions alone or with your friends
- each operation gives you different rewards

Survival
- survive for as long as possible and kill all of your enemies coming in waves
- become the best ranked player around.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Movement, ESC - Menu, Spacebar - Jump, SHIFT - Sprint, CTRL - Crouch, E - Interaction, R - Reload, Q - Change weapon, V - Melee attack, Z - Special attack

game.title: Mini Survival
game.description: Mini Survival is a great mini game where you'll be trying to survive for as long as possible. You start barehanded, with your first objective being to collect a few stones, some wood and other resources that can be used to create your first tools. You can therefore create an axe, a fishing rod or something to attack with, a sword for instance. You can also start a fire that you'll be grateful for during the night. If you like gardening, you can start your own farm by planting seeds. You can also hunt animals. As you can see, the possibilities are endless, and you’ll be entertained for hours.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction, Right mouse button - More options in inventory, WASD keys - Movement, Q || E - Rotate camera, SHIFT - Attack

game.title: Business Tycoon
game.description: Business Tycoon is a strategy game where you’ll have to build up your own store empire. You start off with a single store and you’ll have to do everything yourself. As you progress, you start buying upgrades that will improve the sum of money you earn. After a while, you can buy more upgrades or hire managers who will be taking care of the cash flow. This way, you can improve the stores and earn more revenue. The goal will be to buy up all of the stores and create an empire.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Last Debt
game.description: Last Debt is an interesting simulator where you're trying to make as much many as possible to pay a really high debt. At the beginning of the game you are able to pick how high the debt will be and the time that you need to pay it in. From that stems the game difficulty. Aside from all that you need to take care of your own needs. Try to be healthy, well fed and in good condition both physically and mentally. At the beginning of the game you start in a fast food, but the game is offering you other jobs as well.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction, WASD keys - Movement, SHIFT - Run, Spacebar - Walk, E - Use

game.title: Stunt Destroyer
game.description: Stunt Destroyer is an online game where you’ll be controlling a race car. Your objective is to gain speed on a platform. After that, try to destroy as many obstacles as you can. You will get rewarded with money that can be used to upgrade your engine or your turbo. You can also use this money to buy a new car. Your main objective will be to get to the green box. This can be done only with an upgraded car. If you reach the green box, you continue to the next level!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving

game.title: Save the Penguin
game.description: Save the Penguin is a nice little adventure game with a rather short story. Your objective is to save your friend who’s been imprisoned by evil penguins. If you want to save him, you first need to defeat the penguins. Your friend will be free only after you break his chains. In your surroundings, there will be fish that will help you gain some HP by eating them. There are also snowballs that you can use against your enemies. Move around and explore the world. Get through all of the objectives and defeat your opponents. Good luck!
game.instructions: Mouse - Attack, WASD keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, E - Interaction, 1 || 2 || 3 - Change the item

game.title: Samurai Warrior
game.description: Samurai Warrior is an action online game where you’ll be fighting against a lot of enemies. Right at the beginning of the game, you pick a character that you’ll be playing as. You can pick between a man and a woman. While playing, you won’t be able to change your gender, so be sure to choose correctly. You can then start fighting against your enemies. There's a total of 5 levels where you’ll meet many opponents. They will all try to kill you, so be sure to watch your HP bar. Let’s try the game out!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, Z || X - Attack, C - Defense

game.title: Prison Break
game.description: Prison Break is an action online game where you’ll be in control of an inmate. As the name of the game suggest, your goal will be to break out of prison. There’s a total of 15 levels waiting for you with numerous objectives, where you'll have to unlock a lock, put in the right code or get rid of guards. You always need to get to a place that has been marked on the mini map. Don’t forget that you can use your fists or a baseball bat to attack. The game offers simple gameplay with mediocre graphics, so come on!
game.instructions: Mouse - Attack, WASD keys - Movement, E - Change weapon, SHIFT - Sprint, CTRL - Prone, P - Pause, L - Mouse lock

game.title: Pen Run
game.description: In this game, you will be controlling a pen that you are tasked with getting to the finish line. There will be numerous obstacles waiting for you on the way that can stop you and end the game. Start playing and avoid them all! The game is offering you a fairly small playing field, so you won’t have much space to navigate through. Start playing and show everyone what you’ve got. Scout the whole level.
game.instructions: Mouse - Movement

game.title: Stickman vs Stickman 2
game.description: Stickman vs Stickman 2 is yet another installment into this series where you can expect a ton of new levels with each having a simple goal. Try to get rid of all of the enemies in a given level. To do so, you will have to use as few bullets as you can, since their amount is limited. You won’t always be able to shoot your enemy up front, so try to use the bullet ricocheting from the walls. If you get through all of the levels, be sure to try the first installment!
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Stickman vs Stickman
game.description: Stickman vs Stickman is an online puzzle game where you will have a singular objective - to eliminate all of the stickmen in a given level. Your hero will be shooting his weapon, but you only have a limited number of bullets, so be sure to think about how you're going to use them. In each of the levels, there are some obstacles that you need to use or avoid, to shoot your enemies. There’s a total of 60 levels waiting for you, so don’t worry about getting bored. Will you be able to get through all of them on your first try?
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Deer Simulator: Animal Family 3D
game.description:
Deer Simulator: Animal Family 3D is yet another great online game where you will be playing as a deer. There's a ton of adventures that you can start and find many different enemies and friends. You can build up your own house, start a family and buy accessories that will help you get through all of the obstacles the game throws at your feet. The game is offering a ton of options when it comes to character customization and improvement of your surroundings. If you start playing the game regularly, you will get a ton of great gifts, but you can start exploring the world without this in mind.
It's a great game with pleasant 3D graphics, so be sure to try it out, you won’t regret it.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, Enter key - Attack, SHIFT - Sprint, E - Energy booster, R - Health booster, T - Hunger booster

game.title: Hole Run 3D
game.description: Hole Run 3D is a simple online game with a singular goal. You have to suck up all of the objects ahead of you so that the ball doesn’t touch anything. The first levels will be simple, but as the number of obstacles grows larger and larger, the game will get more and more difficult. If it touches anything, the ball will fall apart and you’ll have to start the level again. Since the levels are generated automatically, their number is infinite. You can play the game for a long time before it starts to bore you.
game.instructions: Mouse - Movement

game.title: Bean Jump
game.description: Bean Jump is an interesting puzzle game where you will be controlling a little bean. Your objective will be to jump around platforms floating on water. There’s a problem however, since you can only jump on a platform once. After you jump away from it, it will disintegrate. There are many other rules that make the gameplay more engaging. The game is offering you a ton of levels, so expect hours and hours of fun. You can also buy new items that can help you break some platforms and thus make the game easier for you. Will you be able to finish all of the levels?
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Defentures
game.description: The game is inspired by Kingdom rush and Age of War. In this game, you are building your kingdom and attacking the present enemy units. You need to find a way how to get as far as possible. Protect yourself and attack whenever the enemy least expects it. Find a way how to win, there’ll be a ton of options available for you, so be ready to have fun!
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Water Boat Racing
game.description: Water Boat Racing is yet another racing game, this time, you will be racing on water, driving water scooters against other racers. Right at the beginning, you will be able to pick a country that you will be representing. You can pick from among many different levels where you will be trying to become the best player and reach the finish line first. Try to pick up boosters as you go, since they will help you reach a better position. The controls are mediocre, but you will surely get used to them after some time.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement

game.title: Car Mechanic 2020
game.description: Car Mechanic 2020 is another interesting simulator where you will try out a new job. You will become a car mechanic and you will try to fix all of the cars that your customers bring you. The game will guide you as to what to do with the cars, but it still won’t be that easy. Aside from that there is a time limit that you will need to be aware of. Sometimes it can be stressful, but you need to keep your calm, you will surely pass the game’s objectives. There will be many different levels for you to try out that you will unlock as you progress through the game. So put on a uniform and start playing!
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Football Storm Strike
game.description: Football Storm Strike is an online sports game where you will be trying to score as many goals against your opponent as possible. You can pick in between four modes. You can either play the tournament mode or try to score as many points in a time limit. In the next mode you will be able to play with a friend and compare your skills. The last mode is the training mode where you will simply be trying to score, kicking the ball as you go. While kicking, you need to set the trajectory of the ball and give it a spin so that you can outsmart the goalie.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Infinity Royale
game.description: Infinity Royale is an action online game where you will be playing as a soldier. Your objective will be to neutralize all of the enemies on the island. You will get transported there by a plane from which you will have to jump down. Firstly, you need to activate your parachute, else you crash into the ground and die. After that you can take a car and get closer to your enemies. You can neutralize them using the car, but the best course of action will be to use your weapon. For each of the levels, you get rewarded. You can later buy new guns in the store. Will you manage to get through all of the 10 missions on your first try?
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Mouse - Shooting, Spacebar - Jump / activate parachute, P - Pause, 1 || 2 - Change weapon, E - Interaction, F - Drop weapon, CTRL - Crouch, SHIFT - Sprint, Arrow keys - Drive car

game.title: Iron Superhero
game.description: Iron Superhero is an action online game where you will be playing as a superhero. Your main objective will be to save hostages and get rid of all of your enemies. Right at the start, you will move to a designated location where the game will provide you with a mission. After that, enemies will show up on the map and you will be tasked with destroying them. Your hero has a few skills of his own, he can shoot lasers, fly or jump really high. If you combine these skills, your enemies won't have a chance against you. The game offers you 20 levels in total, so it will take some time for you to finish the whole game. So come on, try the game out!
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, SHIFT - Sprint, ALT || F - Fly mode, P - Pause, L - Mouse lock

game.title: Five Nights at Old Toy Factory 2020
game.description: Five Nights at Old Toy Factory 2020 is a horror game where you will be working as a night guard in an old toy factory. One night, strange events will start taking place, since some of the toys will come to life and will try to kill you. Explore the factory and try to survive all 5 nights. Your only weapon is a glass bottle. Aside from that you can find notes in the individual rooms that will explain to you what has happened in this specific factory. Good luck.
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Left mouse button - Attack, Right mouse button - Block, F - Interaction, SHIFT - Run, CTRL - Crouch, Spacebar - Jump, P - Pause

game.title: C-Virus Game: Outbreak
game.description: C-Virus Game: Outbreak is an online horror game where 90% of the population were infected with a new virus and were transformed into bloodthirsty monsters. Also, you find yourself alone in an abandoned building and are trying to get out. The main doors are locked, so you need to find three keys that can be anywhere in the building. Since there's a lot of enemies around, you need to first find a weapon with some ammo so that you can defend yourself. After that, start looking for the keys. Will you be able to get through all of the levels on your first try?
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Mouse - Shooting, F - Interaction, SHIFT - Run, CTRL - Crouch, Spacebar - Jump, P - Pause, L - Mouse lock

game.title: FireStorm
game.description: FireStorm is an action game from the future where the whole city is controlled by a single gang terrorizing the citizens living there. Your only option of saving the city is to eliminate the gang. You will have a few fighters at your disposal who will gladly help you out. Your objective will be to complete missions in each of the levels and thus earn money. The money can be used to buy upgrades for your fighter. During the fighting, you can also use vehicles, such as tanks that can help you eliminate your enemies much faster. If you want to pass a level, you must not die, so don't forget to pick up first-aid kids as you progress through the game. So come on, let’s play!
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Mouse - Shooting, Spacebar - Jump, SHIFT - Slow motion, Q || E - Change weapon, X - Throw grenades, Enter key - Enter vehicles, P - Pause

game.title: Backflip Maniac
game.description: Backflip Maniac is great online game, where you'll be jumping with your character. The first levels will be fairly easy, since you won’t be jumping from the highest buildings just yet. As you progress, the levels will get progressively higher. It’s very important to hit the red target, else you won’t be able to move to the next level. The controls can be a bit difficult for some, at the start, but you will adapt in the long run. Overall, the game offers you great gameplay, 3D graphics and 30 levels. So come on, let’s play!
game.instructions: Mouse - Jump

game.title: Hunters and Props
game.description: Hunters and Props is a fun action online game where you’ll be fighting against other players on the server. You will be divided into two teams - hunters and requisites. As a hunter, you will be running around, trying to find those camouflaging as props. You have a little gadget at you that will determine whether there’s a prop hiding somewhere around you - it can either be red or green. While playing as prop, you must be very careful. Try to hide in a secret spot and hope that the enemy won’t be able to find you. Be sure to call up your friends so that you can play together or against each other. It’s going to be fun! We recommend you try the game out!
game.instructions: WASD keys - Movement, Mouse - Shooting, SHIFT - Sprint, 1 || 4 - Change weapons, Enter key - Chat, E - Change props, Q - Audio taunt

game.title: MineClicker
game.description: MineClicker is an online game where you’ll be killing different types of animals and mining blocks. For each animal, you earn points that can then be used to buy different upgrades or to hire up a new companion that will help you out. The blocks can be used to buy new weapons that will allow you to kill faster. The more companions and the better weapons you have, the faster you’ll progress in the game. Will you be able to slay the famous Enderdragon?
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Dino Hunting
game.description: Dino Hunting is a game where your objective will be to hunt down all of the dinosaurs in your proximity. All you have to do is aim well and then shoot. Most of the dinosaurs won't be killed after the first show, so you need to shoot them multiple times. There's also another problem - the dinosaurs will try to catch your smell whenever you shoot. If they manage to do so, they will charge you. After that you will only have a few seconds to kill them. If you fail to do so, you die and will thus have to repeat the level. The game is divided into two locations with each offering a ton of levels that will keep you occupied.
game.instructions: Left mouse button - Shooting, Right mouse button - Aim, R - Reload, L - Mouse lock, 1 || 2 - Change weapon

game.title: Turbo Race 3D
game.description: Turbo Race 3D is a fun online game where you'll be able to enjoy quick races. You will be controlling a character riding a bike. You can drive slower or faster, whichever option you need at the moment. The goal is to collect as many coins as possible and to become the star of the race. To do so, you'll have to avoid all of the obstacles that you find on the way. You should also try to pick up any turbo that you see on the playing field. The controls are rather simple and all you need to do is move it from one side to the other. Good luck!
game.instructions: Mouse - Movement

game.title: Crazy Car Stunts
game.description: Crazy Car Stunts is a crazy online game where you’ll be showing off your tricks in vehicles. There’s a lot of them available, so you can pick a sports car, a monster truck, a military vehicle, a bus or even a normal truck. Each of these have their own physics that can be changed during your play through. Aside from that you see the stats of your vehicle in detail. There are numerous ramps on the map, so pick the right car and you can start jumping around. Pick the right car and start jumping or simply driving around.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Break, V - Getting in / out of the car, C - Change camera, T - Attach trailer

game.title: City Tycoon
game.description: City Tycoon is an online building game where you will be tasked with building up your city. Right at the beginning of the game, you will be able to set up the size of your map. Don’t be a megalomaniac though, it’s better to start small and expand with each play-through. Also, the game might start lagging if your city gets too large. The terrain can be adjusted to your needs. Terrain elevation can also be adjusted. Then, there are some buildings that you might build. You can also build on water. The most important thing is to have a flat terrain base. Don’t forget to build roads connecting the buildings so that cars can drive there. It’s an interesting online game, where you can build up the whole city according to your imagination, so come try it out!
game.instructions: Left mouse button - Interaction, Scroll wheel - Move camera, Right mouse button - Rotate camera, WASD keys - Move on the map

game.title: Zombie Outbreak Arena
game.description: Zombie Outbreak Arena is an online action game where you will be fighting against hordes of undead. For each kill, you will be rewarded with XP that can then be used up to rank up. The game is offering you 5 different maps with a functioning day/night cycle. That’s important because you get awarded with more XP points during the night. When it comes to weapons, these will be scattered randomly around you. Ammo will be limited, so you need to switch weapons frequently. You can also use your surroundings to eliminate your enemies. You can shoot a car tank so that it explodes and kills everyone around.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Movement, R - Reload, Q || E - Change weapons, Spacebar - Dash, ESC - Menu

game.title: Steampunk Genius
game.description: Steampunk Genius is yet another great online game from PS Games. It’s the same game developer who brought you Genius Mechanic. Likewise, you will be able to build almost anything even in this game. Your only limit is your imagination. It’s all made in a steampunk theme. The game is offering you a ton of models that you can choose from, it can be an airplane, a car or even a robot spider walking around. All you need to do is find enough parts so that you wouldn’t have to remake everything. There are quality graphics available together with tons of fun. The game can also be played on a mobile phone.
game.instructions: Left mouse button - Interaction, Scroll wheel - Zoom, Right mouse button - Rotate camera, CTRL - Move camera

game.title: Police Helicopter
game.description: Police Helicopter is a 3D online game where you will be flying a helicopter. Your objective is to find a vehicle that’s being driven by a criminal that you need to eliminate. This vehicle is being pursued by police vehicles though, so you need to watch out not to hit them. If you destroy them, you will have to start again. There are also skyscrapers in the city that you need to avoid, else you might crash into them. The game is offering you 20 levels in total that you will be continuously unlocking with new helicopters awaiting you. There’s a lot to look forward to!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, W - Go up, S - Go down, A || D - Special rockets, Spacebar - Shooting

game.title: Mini Tennis 3D
game.description: Mini Tennis 3D is a great online game for tennis fans. If you don’t want to deal with any settings, you can simply start playing right away. Your objective will be to win every match. You will then start ascending the leader boards and earning more diamonds. These can be spent in the menu and you can buy a new character with these. There is 27 characters in total, so you will be able to choose whichever you want. You can also earn the diamonds in bonus levels where a mini-game awaits. During the fight, you can find many different bonuses that you can pick up. You can expect pretty graphics and simple gameplay, so enjoy the game!
game.instructions: Mouse - Movement / interaction

game.title: Sports Car Wash
game.description: Sports Car Wash is an interesting 3D game where you will be driving your customers’ cars into a car wash. Some will first need to be tanked, so that you don’t stop halfway to the car wash. You would have to repeat the level if that happened. You simply need to get to a gas station, stop the engine and fill your gas tank. After that you start the car up again and drive it to the car wash. When you get there, you again stop your engine, pay and then park the car next to the cleaning nozzles. When the car gets cleaned, you need to take it to a specified location. After doing that you can continue to the next level. In each of the levels there will be a different car waiting for you, it could be a sports car or a van. The objective will be the same, just take care not to run out of gas.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Handbrake, I - Engine on / off, C - Change camera

game.title: The Island Survival
game.description: The Island Survival is an action online game where you’ll be fighting for your life. You find yourselves alone in a small hut in the middle of nowhere. If you want to survive, you’ll have to find food and secure all of the resources you need to survive. You’re lucky, since there’s a ton of wild-life running around. It’s not always easy to hunt them down, but if you want to eat, you’ll have to try. You can also gather resources that you find on the ground. You can make tools out of them and build defenses and other structures. During the day, the surroundings are safe, but during night time, you better run hide in your hut, else feral animals might hunt you down. Enjoy this great game, where you’ll be playing on a deserted island!
game.instructions: Mouse - Attack, WASD keys - Movement, E - Interaction, SHIFT - Run, I - Inventory, 1 || 9 - Change tool, P - Pause

game.title: Offroad Cycle 3D
game.description: Do you like adventures and natural beauty? If yes, then you’ll love Offroad Cycle 3D. You’ll sit on your mountain bike and will start driving through mountain passes. The goal will be to avoid all obstacles and to get to the finish line as fast as you can. Each level has its time limit, so don’t wait up too much. You also need to get some momentum when you’re driving up-hills, since you can very easily stop short of the top and then slide back down. The game has average 3D graphics and 10 levels where you’ll be tasked with showing your cycling skills. If you’re a fan of cycling, try the game out and see if you like it!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Brake, C - Change camera

game.title: Rickshaw Driving
game.description: Rickshaw Driving is an interesting online game, where you’ll be driving a rickshaw. It’s a three wheeled cart that you move by cycling. Each driver has his max level of stamina, so you can’t always go as fast as you’d like. Your goal is to earn enough cash to buy a new vehicle or a new driver. This type of transport was very popular before cars made their appearance. At the moment, it’s still popular in Asia. Find out something about history and try the game out!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, ESC - Back in the menu

game.title: Water Slide 3D
game.description: Water Slide 3D is a great online game that you can play and slide down many great water slides. The goal of the game is to collect as many coins and special items that you can. Try to dodge all of the different obstacles that could endanger your life. You have a limited number of lives, so be really careful. Aside from that, you can also come across a surf that you can ride for a while. You can use the earned coins to unlock new characters or items, like glasses for instance. Will you be able to get through all of the levels on your first try? So jump on your bike and have fun!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement

game.title: Russian Truck Simulator
game.description: Russian Truck Simulator is a 3D online game where you’ll be controlling a truck. As is usual in these sorts of games, your objective will be to get the cargo safely towards the finish line. The terrain is pretty harsh to get through, so be prepared for a bumpy ride. Be sure not to fall from a cliff, since that would mean the end and you’d have to start from scratch. It’s better to slow down whenever you can, even though you have a time limit. For each level you complete, you are eligible for a reward that you can then spend by buying a new truck for instance. While driving, you can switch the camera angle, which will come in handy while parking, where you’ll need a view from the top. If you like big cars, you will surely enjoy this game.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, I - Engine on / off, K || L - Lights, C - Change camera, Q || E - Blinker, Z - Warning lights

game.title: Underwater Cycling
game.description: Underwater Cycling is a game taking place underwater. It’s even weirder when you take in that you’ll be cycling underwater. Your objective will be to keep on the platform. If you fall down from it, you will have to repeat the level. On your way, you need to collect gems and other valuable items. At the same time, you’ll need to keep your eye on your oxygen level that will keep decreasing slowly. Don’t worry, you will find new oxygen sources as you cycle through the levels. Don’t waste time though, if your oxygen runs out, you’ll have to repeat the level. For your reward, you will be able to buy new riders, so don’t forget that.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, SHIFT - Nitro

game.title: Extreme Stunts Unlimited
game.description: Extreme Stunts Unlimited is a very difficult game where you will be controlling a car on a dangerous platform. Your objective will be to get though all of the obstacles. Some of these will be static while others will be moving, like the giant guillotine that is present in the game. This will make the game a bit harder. You will need to show that you’re the best driver around. Each level has a time limit, so don’t waste time. You will have 10 levels at your disposal, so you won’t be bored. Can you get though all of the levels on your first try? Try it out!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Brake

game.title: Twisty Rolling
game.description: Twisty Rolling is a quick game where you’ll be controlling a ball on a dangerous platform. You will have to react quickly, since the ball is heading towards obstacles that you will sometimes see at the last second. Aside from that you need to get further and earn points that you can then spend on skins. If you really want to get far try a trick. Get out of the platform, fly for a bit. You will then need to return back to the platform, else you’ll have to start again. Good luck!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement

game.title: SlidePark.io
game.description: SlidePark.io is a fun online game where you’ll be racing on a water slide. There are 20 enemies in front of your that you’ll need to get through so that you can finish first. You don’t need to worry the slide is long enough to accommodate that. You simply need to dodge everyone. If you crash into them, you will move them in front of you and you don’t want to do that. You can try a trick, when you get to the edge of the slide, you can jump down and shorten your way. But you need to aim precisely, since if you miss, the game ends for you. So good luck!
game.instructions: Mouse - Movement

game.title: Touchdown!
game.description: Touchdown! is a funny online game where you’ll be playing American football. Your objective is to get as many points as you can and thus defeat your opponent. You can only do that by scoring a touchdown. You need to get the ball to the end of the playing field. Move around the playing field in such a way that you get the ball from your opponent or protect the ball in your possession. If you have a friend nearby, you can both play on one PC. It’s much more fun and you can see who the better player is. The game offers simple gameplay and pixelated 2D graphics that you’ll surely love. Come try the game out!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, WASD keys - Movement

game.title: Lion Hunter
game.description: Lion Hunter is an action 3D game where you’ll be playing as a lion hunter. There are a few levels awaiting you where you’ll have a single goal on your mind, to kill dangerous animals and thus protect the jungle. Some lions only take one bullet to kill, other will need at least two. After the first shot, the lions will run towards you, so be ready. There are numerous levels where you won’t be in immediate danger, but you’ll still have to protect other animals like zebras. You need to fire as quickly as you can. Each level also has a time limit, so take care.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting

game.title: Wild Wolves
game.description: Wild Wolves is a 3D game, where you’ll be controlling a wild wolf. You will be trying to complete each level, with each level being a bit different. At the beginning, the game will be rather simple – follow the alpha. After that, you will need to hunt for prey or defend the pack from enemies. Read the instructions outlining the objective so that you always know what to do. There’s a time limit present for each level, so if you fail to finish it in that timeframe, you will have to repeat it. The game has average 3D graphics and the controls could be better, but it’s still a shame that the game only offers you 9 levels. Will you manage to complete all 9 of them at your first try?
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, SHIFT - Sprint, Spacebar - Attack

game.title: Boat Rescue
game.description: Boat Rescue is a 3D game, where you’ll be trying to saving people stranded on and in buildings after a flood hit the city. Ride your boat and embark on that dangerous mission. Controlling the boat among all of the floating debris won’t be an easy task and you also need to get as close to a person as possible, so that he manages to float to your location. When you pick him up, try to get to a bigger boat as fast as possible, so professionals can take care of the survivors you bring them. You’ll have to work within a time limit, so be careful not to get stranded. It could very well happen that you’ll have to repeat the level if that happens. So come try the game out!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving

game.title: Bird Flight
game.description: Bird Flight is a 3D online game, where you’ll be flying with a bird over beautiful landscapes. Your only objective will be to fly through the rings and to get as far as possible. At the beginning, this might seem very simple, but it will get progressively harder and harder with each level, since your reaction time will have to get slower and slower. Also dodge trees and other obstacles that can take one life away. Try to get the best score you can and overcome your previous high score. You can pick new skins in the menu, so come on, let’s try the game out!
game.instructions: Mouse - Movement

game.title: Russian Train Simulator
game.description: Russian Train Simulator is yet another game from a long line of simulators that will let you be the train engineer. The game offers you three modes – training mode, people transport mode and cargo transport mode. Your objective is to reach the the station, wait for the people to get on, or the cargo to get loaded and then move them to the terminus station. Take care to stop before the red notification. If you stop after that, or you fail to finish before the time runs out, the game ends and you’ll have to repeat the whole level. Aside from that you can also change camera angles and have the camera from inside of the locomotive. That’s pretty realistic. Have fun!
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Xtreme Monster Truck
game.description: In today’s online game Xtreme Monster Truck, you will be able to drive a few great vehicles. As is common in these games, you will have to get through a few demanding obstacles, so that you can reach the next level. On your way, you will have to get as many coins as possible that you can later use to unlock new vehicles. You have two worlds that you can choose from, together with 10 levels whose difficulty will be rising slowly, which means that you’ll be getting less and less time to complete everything. The speed isn’t everything since you’ll have to control your truck. So drive carefully. The game is offering you great 3D graphics, so be sure to try it out!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Handbrake

game.title: Crazy Bull Attack
game.description: In today’s game, you will be working as a hunter. The city has called you after several bulls escaped into the streets and are smashing whatever they can find. Your objective is to start removing them and thus save the people living there. At the beginning there won’t be that many of them, but soon it will get harder for you to survive. Use the cash you earn to buy new weapons that will help you in your fight against these dangerous animals. The game is offering OK graphics and simple controls, so come on, try it out!
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, SHIFT - Sprint, P - Pause, L - Mouse lock

game.title: Cash Transport Simulator
game.description: In today’s 3D game, you will be working as an employee of a bank. Your objective will be to drive money to ATMs at precise locations. You’ll be doing the same thing over and over – pick up the money at a bank. Get into the car. Start driving towards an ATM and put in the money. After that you need to drive your car to work and it’s over. Your colleague is always with you and will help you if you get attacked. While driving, try to be as careful as possible. All it takes is to crash into an innocent civilian and the game can end right afterwards. So come on and play!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, Spacebar - Handbrake, E - Enter the car, P - Pause, L - Mouse lock

game.title: Dino Transport
game.description: Dino Transport is an interesting online game where you’ll be playing as a truck driver. Your main objective will be to get your dinosaurs to a local Zoo which won’t be easy at all. You will have to get through marked areas and park at the right spot. There’s a time limit present, so you won’t have unlimited time to do that. The game offers you three modes. You can just simply drive around, or move your dinosaurs. Then there’s the third mode, where it can get really dangerous. One dinosaur escaped from his cage and you’ll have to catch it. So catch him and get him to the finish line, else you’re finished. So come on, let’s play.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Handbrake, C - Change camera, ESC - Pause

game.title: Xtreme Demolition Arena Derby
game.description: Xtreme Demolition Arena Derby is yet another great game where you’ll be destroying enemy cars in an arena. In each level, there will be a kill count that you’ll have to fulfill, so that you win and move further up. Of course, you will be rewarded with money that you can later use to unlock new vehicles. There’s a total of 6 of them available. During the game, try not to crash into barrels, since they can explode and destroy your vehicle. Try to play tactically at first and push your enemies into them. If the game lags at first, you can use the settings to lower your quality.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Handbrake, C - Change camera

game.title: Hungry Shark
game.description: Hungry Shark is a pretty rough game where you’ll be controlling a big shark. As the name suggests your objective will be to hunt down as many beach goers as you can. At the top of your screen is a kill count that you need to reach. You can eat both the people swimming and the people on boats. When they fall into the water you can attack them. Aside from that you can get a speed boosts for a while. You also need to take care to look at your time, since a longer period of not killing anyone could mean game over. Will you be able to get through all of the levels on your first try?
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, W - Acceleration, P - Pause

game.title: Crazy Demolition Derby V1
game.description: Crazy Demolition Derby V1 is a great game where you can try destroying many different vehicles. Of course, you are trying to destroy your opponents’ cars, not your own. These demolitions and wins will bring you more money that you can later use for buying upgrades and changing the style and power of your vehicle. You can also buy an entirely new car. Since this is a multiplayer game, you will be playing with real players, or even your friends if you invite them. The game offers you 3D graphics and fun gameplay, so don’t worry about getting bored. There can be up to 14 people in one lobby. Aside from that the game offers you 6 maps.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Handbrake, B - Look back, C - Change camera, TAB - Statistics

game.title: Hit Targets
game.description: Hit Targets is an online game where you’ll be using a sniper rifle. Your objective will be to hit all of the targets in a specific level. At the beginning this will be easy, since the objects will be very close to each other. Each level will rack up the difficulty a bit and with each level, the targets will be getting a bit smaller. The greater the distance between you and the target, the more you’ll scope will be moving. You also need to count with wind speed and direction. So in total, there’s 15 levels awaiting you. So come on, let’s play!
game.instructions: Left mouse button - Shooting, Right mouse button - Aim, 1 || 4 - Zoom, H - Hold breath, P - Pause

game.title: Maze Cube
game.description: Maze Cube is a reflex focused game where you’ll be trying to get your ball into the maze and then out again. The problem is that you can only move forwards and there’s no way of stopping. Aside from that you cannot touch any of the walls of the maze, else the game ends and you’ll have to start again. The game has a single goal for you, to stay alive and to earn as many points as you can. Aside from that you can also try to pick up diamonds on your way. The graphics is really minimalistic, so don’t expect anything stellar. So come on, let’s play!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement

game.title: Bus Parking Simulator
game.description: Bus Parking Simulator is a great game where you’ll be playing as a bus driver. Your objective will of course be to get through all of the obstacles and to get the bus to the highlighted place. Try to park as precisely as you can, else the game won’t count your try and you’ll have to repeat the level. There will be a total of 40 levels in 3D graphics awaiting you. If you have trouble controlling such a behemoth of a vehicle, you can switch to a roof camera view that will help you a bit. You can use the money you’ve earned in the store to buy a new bus. So come on, light up the engine and start driving!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Handbreak, C - Change camera

game.title: Russian Hill Driver
game.description: In today’s game, you will be playing as a Russian truck driver. Your objective will be to transport heavy cargo to a specified location. You first need to pick up the cargo and then follow the road signs that will lead you to your destination. There will be numerous obstacles waiting for you that you need to overcome, because if your cargo falls out of the truck, you’ll have to restart the level. When you get into your garage, you’ll be able to change your car’s color, or to buy entirely new car. It’s up to you. Later, you’ll be able to unlock the winter settings that are locked at the beginning of the game. So start up your car and let’s play!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Brake, C - Change camera

game.title: Billiard Tour
game.description: Billiard Tour is a great online game for all fans of billiard. In this game, you will be trying to become a professional player. To do so, you’ll have to get through a multitude of levels. There will always be a different number of balls and they will be put on the table differently. Your objective will be to get rid of all the balls. The problem is however, that you have a limited number of lives, which means that you can miss only a few times. Try to thus be as precise as you can, so that you hit everything on your first try, since you will lose lives if you don’t and you don’t want to repeat the level because of it. The money you earn can be used in the store to buy new equipment.
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Football World Cup 2019
game.description: Today, we have a great 3D football game to offer to every sports fan. At the beginning of the game, you will pick your favorite team. There won’t be any classic clubs, but rather national teams. You can also pick the length of a match and the difficulty of the AI. You can then start up the match, where you’ll be trying to score as many goals as possible. If you pick the Hard AI difficulty, don’t forget to pass the ball as much as you can and to aim before shooting. If you don’t do that, your opponent will get the ball and it will be really difficult to take it from him. So come try the game out!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, Z || Y - Pass / slide tackle, X - Shooting

game.title: Incredible Monster
game.description: In this game, you will be controlling a big, mutated monster that is trying to save the city. You will of course be helping it with its task. At the beginning of the game, you choose your color. At start, only green is available, but you can buy other colors for coins later in the game. There is a total of 4 different bigger missions. In each missions there are a few levels awaiting you, where you’ll be trying to kill all of your enemies. These enemies are marked with a red dot on the map. All you need to do is find them, fight them and win. At the beginning, these opponents won’t give you much of a fight, but later, their numbers will be growing and they’ll get stronger and stronger. Don’t forget your special attack and the fact that you can even throw a car at them. There’s also a time limit, so don’t slow down too much. Can you save the whole city?
game.instructions: Mouse - Attack, WASD keys - Movement, Spacebar - Jump, Q - Kick, E - Special attack, C - Vehicle lift / drop, M - Map, P - Pause

game.title: Penguins.io
game.description: Penguins.io is an addictive game where you control a small penguin fighting on an ice-berg. Your objective will be to push all of the other penguins off. If you become the last surviving penguin, you win. It’s sort of an icy battle royale. The one who survives last, wins. The iceberg will be getting smaller and smaller as individual pieces will begin to fall off. That’s why it’ll become increasingly difficult to defend against enemy attacks and to survive. You have no other chance than to attack first. All you need to do is point your penguin in the right direction and load up as much strength as you can. This way you can launch off more opponents at once.
game.instructions: Mouse - Movement

game.title: Ninja Cube
game.description: Ninja Cube is an online game in pixelated graphics where you’ll be controlling a ninja warrior. You just need to aim a bit and shoot him right up into the air. His advantage is that he can switch directions mid-air and attack an otherwise well-hidden enemy. Try to collect all shurrikens so that you get awarded all of the available stars. The main goal of this game is to find the princess who has been taken prisoner. So come on, start playing!
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Ambulance Driver
game.description: Ambulance Driver is a 3D game, where you’ll be controlling an ambulance. Your objective will be to get the paramedics to the precise location of the accident. After picking up the patients, you will be driving them to the hospital based on the locations given to you. The city is huge, so you could get lost without your trusty map. To add to the stress, there’s a time limit to each level. If you fail, you’ll have to repeat the level. You also must not crash during your driving session. The is offering you 10 levels and lower end graphics. So sit in your ambulance and save lives!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, Spacebar - Brake

game.title: Apocalypse World
game.description:
Zombie apocalypse is upon us and most of humanity is already dead. Most of those who aren’t dead have turned into bloodthirsty zombies. Few survivors, however, are immune to the disease. These people don’t have it easy, since they need to fight for their lives all day long. Your hero is one of those people and you’ll need to help him survive in this inhospitable land. To survive, try to look for empty buildings and water sources. Avoid zombies that can attack you at any moment. Try to move slowly in a car or a motorbike, since you can cover more ground this way and it won’t be as dangerous as going on foot. 
 
 The game includes: 
 * Driving bikes, cars and riding horses
 * Flying on a glider
 * Fighting the zombies
 * A big, open world.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, WASD keys - Movement, SHIFT - Sprint, E - Interaction, F - Get off the horse, CTRL - Crouch, 1 || 2 - Change weapon, P - Pause, L - Mouse lock

game.title: Forest Hunter
game.description: In today’s game, you’ll be playing as a hunter who will be trying to catch a certain number of game. Right at the beginning you can choose what type of animal you want to hunt for. There are six options to choose and the harder to catch types include rabbits and ducks. You need to be careful around wolves, who will attack you right after you fire your gun. There are difficulty levels to choose that come with each animal, but if you start lowering them, the reward will be smaller. Try to earn as much money as you can to buy new guns at the store. There’s a lot of them available, some look great, even though they may be more expensive than others. The hunting season started already, so let’s go!
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, E - Night vision, P - Pause

game.title: Farmer Simulator 2019
game.description: Today, we’re presenting you a great simulator game where you’ll try out what’s it like to be farmer. The game offers you 20 different levels where you’ll be cultivating and caring for your crops. Aside from that, you will also be able to drive some farm machinery that can make your life easier. For each level, you will get rewarded, so that you can buy new tractors and equipment. Take care not to run out of fuel while working, since you would have to buy it and start again. If you love simulators, this game will be great for you!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Driving, X - Activate machine

game.title: Crazy Machines
game.description: Crazy Machines is an action online game where you’ll be controlling a flying fighting machine. Your objective will be to destroy other machines that are trying to attack you. The game is divided into more levels, with each of them having stronger and stronger enemies. You can finish a few rounds with the original machine that you’re given, but you’ll soon find out that you need to upgrade it a bit if you want to have a chance against the stronger enemies that you’ll encounter. Become the best player on your block!
game.instructions: Mouse - Interaction

game.title: Airplane Tunnel
game.description: In this game, you will be controlling an airplane in a dangerous tunnel. It’s dangerous mainly because of all the obstacles that are blocking your way. The blue ones can be destroyed via your rockets, but beware, since you only have a limited amount of these. The red obstacles cannot be destroyed at all, so you always have to dodge them. Aside from that you need to collect golden coins that can later be used to buy a new airplane that has more rockets available. You may also get extra rockets from time to time, but don’t count on it.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, Spacebar - Shooting

game.title: Cat Runner
game.description: Today, we’re presenting you a great 3D game, where you’ll be running around city streets with a cat. Your objective will be to pick up bones and to dodge individual obstacles. Aside from static obstacles, you’ll also have to avoid gigantic rats or mad dogs. If you touch any of your enemies, the game will take one heart away from you. You have a total of three lives, so take care. You can also try to complete many different missions that will reward you with a price once you succeed!
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement

game.title: Hunter 3D
game.description: Today, we present you an interesting 3D game where you’ll be playing as a hunter. The game is divided in 2 parts and in each of them, you will be competing with an opponent. You will be tasked with shooting more targets than your competitors. The closer to the middle you hit, the more points you’ll get. Your objective is to win, so be sure to be as accurate as possible.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting

game.title: Strong Defense
game.description: In today's online game, you'll be playing as an archer tasked with a very important objective. You'll be guarding the castle gates against a never-ending horde of enemies. The enemy lines include monsters like trolls that will move slowly or flying creatures that will be more difficult to hit. So try concentrate as much as you can and don't forget to buy upgrades, since they can make the odds of winning better!
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting

game.title: Battle Tanks
game.description: Today we present you a modern online version of the legendary Battle City. Your goal will again be to protect your home base from enemy tanks. First levels will be fairly easy, but it’s gonna get hard real fast. It will get progressively harder, since the enemies will be protected by shields later on. Try to shoot the enemy car, since you can get some nice bonuses this way. 20 different levels are awaiting you.
game.instructions: Arrow keys - Movement, Spacebar - Shooting

game.title: Insects: Alien Shooter
game.description: Your team left you all alone and now you have to take care of everything… alone. The planet is crawling with enemies. You are hearing strange sounds. They are getting closer now. You must stay calm, pick up your weapon and shoot everything that moves. You’ll need luck to survive, but believe me when I say it’s going to be a fun ride.
game.instructions: Mouse - Shooting, P - Menu
